Package labb5.simulation.supermarket.state

Class SupermarketState

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
labb5.simulation.general.SimState
labb5.simulation.supermarket.state.SupermarketState
public class SupermarketState extends SimState
SupermarketState is the implemented supermarket state class for all supermarket general state contexts. a SupermarketState object encapsulates all the state information needed to set up a supermarket simulation. This state information includes, but is not limited to:
  • customer contexts
  • delta time generation
  • time contexts
Version:
%I%, %G%
Author:
Stefan Jonsson, Dino Lolic, William Kiwanuka, Arvid From
See Also:
  • SimState

  • Constructor Details

    • SupermarketState

      public SupermarketState(int seed, int customerMax, double lambda, double kMin, double kMax, double pMin, double pMax, int maxRegisters)
      the class constructor setting up the initial state.
      Parameters:
      seed - a seed for initializing random values
      customerMax - the maximum capacity of customers in the supermarket
      lambda - the rate at which customers arrive, 1 over lambda per unit of time on average
      kMin - the minimum time to process a customer
      kMax - the maximum time to process a customer
      pMin - the minimum time for a customer to shop
      pMax - the maximum time for a customer to shop
      maxRegisters - the maximum amount of free registers in the shop
